text: Maples is an unincorporated community in Jefferson Township, Allen County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Maples in 1854, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1921. The community was named for Lewis S. Maples, a lumber baron. ==Geography== Maples is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Allen County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana Category:Fort Wayne, IN Metropolitan Statistical Area
title: Maples, Indiana
